title: PMS 2.0 604 - Ian Rapoport, Jon Rothstein, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about the new narratives floating around about how Aaron Rodgers wants to become the highest paid player in the NFL "by a wide margin," how narratives get created within the sports media world, Russell Wilson removing everything related to the Seahawks on his Twitter and Instagram, what Troy Aikman going to ESPN means for a bunch of other networks, and more. Joining the show to get us up to date on everything pertaining to Aaron Rodgers, which veteran QB's might go where, how his ski trip is going, and more (24:00-45:58). Later, CBS College Basketball Insider, FanDuel contributor, someone who knows more about college basketball than possibly anybody on the planet, the man who sleeps in May, Jon Rothstein joins the progrum to preview March Madness, who we should be looking to place bets on, when he knew he wanted to talk about nothing other than college basketball, and more (1:03:11-1:29:56). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
